metadata.name: Arbitrary File Download Via IMEWDBLD.EXE
metadata.comment: Detects usage of "IMEWDBLD.exe" to download arbitrary files

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\imewdbld.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('imewdbld.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('http://')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('https://'))))

output.summary: Detects usage of "IMEWDBLD.exe" to download arbitrary files
